activities: Cloudera, Inc. does not seek or obtain personal information as part of its software licensing and services business, other than log-in information in connection with customers and other users log into Cloudera's web sites, and as described in Cloudera's Privacy Policy with respect to such activities. Cloudera does perform maintenance ans services for its customers software installations and may temporarily be in receipt of personal information in connection with performance of such maintenance and services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer and other user information entered or collected as part of the log-in process. Cloudera does not include manually processed data.
privacyprograms: Cloudera has engaged TRUSTe for Safe Harbor purposes.
recoursemech: TRUSTe has been engaged to provide private sector dispute resolution services.
